codeText:
<main style="border: 1px dashed gold; align-items: center; display: grid; grid-template-areas: 'example-nav' 'example-header' 'example-article' 'example-footer'; height: 100%; width: 100%;">
  <nav style="grid-area: example-nav; border: inherit;">link1 | link2</nav>
  <header style="grid-area: example-header; border: inherit;">My header</header>
  <article style="justify-content: space-around; display: flex; grid-area: example-article; border: inherit;">
    <section style="grid-area: example-section; border: inherit;">Section information</section>
    <aside style="grid-area: example-aside; border: inherit;">Aside information</aside>
  </article>
  <footer style="grid-area: example-footer; border: inherit;">My footer</footer>
</main>
